answers.answer: I do say i haven't experienced that before but every pregnancy is different

question: Hi I am 38 weeks today and due to be induced at 39 because of gestational diabetes. Had a sweep this morning and  am having period like cramps now with a white lumpy watery discharge. Is this normal?  Has anyone else experienced this? Not sure if I should be worried about infection. :(
title: white lumpy discharge after sweep
